post.title: panasonic tv will not connect to laptop
post.content: hi, i have a pansonic viera tx-p50g10b flat screen and for the past 6 months hooked my laptop up to the vga port and all worked fine. for some reason is has stopped working and does not recognise my laptop is connected. i have tried 2 different vga cables and 2 other laptops and still no joy. is there a certain set up that may have changed on the tv itself?? kind regards griff
